SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

Class Message

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Message extends Object implements Serializable
The Message class represents a message exchanged between the client and the server. It provides constructors for creating various types of messages and methods for accessing their content.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(jakarta.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
      Constructs a Message object from a JsonObject.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - the JsonObject containing message data.

    • Message

      public Message(File jsonFile) throws IOException
      Constructor for a normal json message from a file.
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - the json file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode)
      Constructs a Message object representing a single message with the given message code.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the identifier of the message.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, String argument)
      Constructs a Message object representing a generic text message with the given message code and text.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - represents the identifier of the message.
      argument - represents the body of the message.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, int number)
      Constructs a Message object representing a player number message with the given message code and maximum number of players.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the identifier of the message.
      number - the int value associated with the message.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, StarterCard starterCard)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing a StarterCard. This constructor is used to send information about a StarterCard.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the identifier of the message.
      starterCard - the StarterCard to include in the message.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing information about an objective card. The objective card information includes its objective and card points.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the identifier of the message.
      objectiveCard - the objective card for which the message is created.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard1, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard2)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing information about two objective cards. The objective card information includes its objective and card points. Used both for sending common objectives and secret objectives options.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the identifier of the message: "CommonObjectives", "SecretObjectives"
      objectiveCard1 - the first objective card.
      objectiveCard2 - the second objective card.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, PlayableCard playableCard)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing a PlayableCard. This constructor is used to send information about a PlayableCard.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      playableCard - The PlayableCard to include in the message.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, PlayableCard playableCard, Coordinates coordinates)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing a PlayableCard and its coordinates.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      playableCard - The PlayableCard to include in the message.
      coordinates - The coordinates of the PlayableCard.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, String nickname, PlayableCard playableCard, Coordinates coordinates)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing a nickname, PlayableCard, and its coordinates.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      nickname - The nickname associated with the message.
      playableCard - The PlayableCard to include in the message.
      coordinates - The coordinates of the PlayableCard.

      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      goldCard - The GoldCard to include in the message.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, String nickname, GoldCard goldCard, Coordinates coordinates)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing a nickname, GoldCard, and its coordinates.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      nickname - The nickname associated with the message.
      goldCard - The GoldCard to include in the message.
      coordinates - The coordinates of the GoldCard.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, Map<String,StarterCard> starterCards, Map<String,List<PlayableCard>> playersHands)
      Constructs a Message object containing starter cards and player hands. Used when sending game start conditions.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      starterCards - The map of starter cards.
      playersHands - The map of player hands.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, List<PlayableCard> visibleResourceCards, PlayableCard coveredResourceCard, List<GoldCard> visibleGoldCards, GoldCard coveredGoldCard)
      Constructs a Message object representing the draw options.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      visibleResourceCards - The list of visible resource cards.
      coveredResourceCard - The covered resource card.
      visibleGoldCards - The list of visible gold cards.
      coveredGoldCard - The covered gold card.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, int xCoordinate, int yCoordinate)
      Constructs a Message object representing a message containing coordinates. This constructor is used to send information about coordinates where to place the card.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      xCoordinate - The x-coordinate value.
      yCoordinate - The y-coordinate value.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, Map<String,Integer> scores)
      Constructs a Message object with a message code and a map of scores.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the identifier of the message.
      scores - the map of scores.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, Map<String,Integer> scores, ObjectiveCard commonObjectiveCard1, ObjectiveCard commonObjectiveCard2, Map<String,ObjectiveCard> secretObjectiveCards, Stack<PlayableCard> resourceDeck, Stack<GoldCard> goldDeck, List<PlayableCard> visibleResourceCards, List<GoldCard> visibleGoldCards, Map<String,List<PlayableCard>> playersHands, Map<String,Card[][]> playAreas, String currentPlayer, String lastPlayer, GameState lastRound, Map<String,Map<CornerContent,Integer>> playersStock)
      Constructs a game backup message.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      scores - The map of player scores.
      commonObjectiveCard1 - The first common objective card.
      commonObjectiveCard2 - The second common objective card.
      secretObjectiveCards - The map of secret objective cards.
      resourceDeck - The resource deck stack.
      goldDeck - The gold deck stack.
      visibleResourceCards - The list of visible resource cards.
      visibleGoldCards - The list of visible gold cards.
      playersHands - The map of players' hands.
      playAreas - The map of players' play areas.
      currentPlayer - The current player.
      lastPlayer - The last player.
      lastRound - The last game state.

    • Message

      public Message(String messageCode, Map<String,Integer> scores, Map<String,List<PlayableCard>> playersHands, Map<String,Card[][]> playAreas)
      Constructs a message to send the restored game to all the players.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - The identifier of the message.
      scores - The map of player scores.
      playersHands - The map of players' hands.
      playAreas - The map of players' play areas.
